sections.paragraph: + One of the six sons of Jeduthun. (1 Chronicles 25:3,15) (B.C. 1014.) + A Levite in the reign of David, eldest son of Rehabiah, a descendant of Amram through Moses. (1 Chronicles 26:25) [ISSHIAH] (B.C. before 1014.) + The son of Athaliah, and chief of the house of Bene-Elam who returned with Ezra. (Ezra 8:7) [[703]Josias] (B.C. 459.) + A Merarite who returned with Ezra. (Ezra 8:19)
